https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bB7gOrRintXqYF1ZmLJaPpR0IAr.jpg Successful actress Vera Lockman thrashes during a nightmare in which she struggles with, shoots and kills her drug-dealer ex-boyfriend. Jolted awake, she reveals in her journal that the killing actually occurred the day before and that Sal, dead, lies in a trunk in her living room. An Imperfect Murder
